name: Rhino Runner
description:
Story:

Player character is Rhino man and his mission in this platformer/runner game is to find balloons in different levels. 8 Different maps. Levels contain moving objects, rotating objects, moving deathly traps like moving spikes and moving balls. Also falling from map or if player hit water, player is killed and level need start again. So be a hero and make accurate jumps to avoid traps and find balls

Features:

- 9 maps
- Deathly traps like moving spikes
- Falling out of map or hitting water will kill player
- Rotating objects
